name: Drow
description: Descended from an earlier subrace of dark-skinned elves, the drow were banished from the surface world for following the goddess Lolth down the path to evil and corruption.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

features.name: Drow Weapon Training
features.description: You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.

features.name: Drow Magic
features.description: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip. At 3rd level you can cast Faerie Fire once per long rest. At 5th level you can cast Darkness once per long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

spells.name: Dancing Lights
spells.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration.
